template <typename BlockT>
struct vsip::impl::Proper_type_of
File: ../../../vsip/core/block_traits.hpp

Temporary trait to determine "proper" type of block.

Dispatch templates can sometimes strip the 'const' off of a block type. This causes problems for exprssion block, which must be const.

-Public Typedefs
ITE_Type::type type
-Public Typenames
typename ITE_Type < Is_expr_block < BlockT > :: value , As_type < BlockT const > , Non_const_of < BlockT > > :: type
